title: Bears Best Golf - Type ID
content:
Hello all, Type ID needed. At first I thought it would be a simple “standard” but I was wrong. [Website](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906203129/http:/www.bearsbest.com/) does not help much.

Thanks,  
Dirk
